issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Jobs that did not start are shown as starting in 1969 in the JHS web UI

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

This message was automatically generated.

Patch looks good. Couple of minor comments:
# In JobInfo, the changes to {{getStartTimeStr()}} and the following whitespace fixes seem unrelated. Can we skip them? 
# In TestJobInfo, how does the check for "N/A" match "NA" that we initialize the return string to in the corresponding methods?

bq. In TestJobInfo, how does the check for "N/A" match "NA" that we initialize the return string to in the corresponding methods?
NA is a static field in JobInfo, which is essentially 'N/A'. To avoid confusion, I have updated the patch to directly reference JobInfo.NA in the test.
